title: A Data Package with Urban Land Cover Classifications for a Selection of Cities in the Brazilian Amazon
text: amazonULC package aims provide land cover classification maps Brazilian Amazonian cities. Land cover maps can contribute urban planning Amazonian cities, applications monitoring urban sprawl, environmental protection areas, assisting urban zoning, identifying areas high building density, among others. amazonULC provides urban land cover classification cities Altamira, Cametá, Marabá, Santarém part Metropolitan Area Belém, state Pará, Brazilian Legal Amazon. Location map cities analyzed amazonULC. maps following land cover classes: “Shrub Vegetation” (SV), “Herbaceous Vegetation” (HV), “Water” (Wa), “Exposed Ground” (EG), “High Gloss Cover” (HG), “Ceramic Cover” (Ce), “Fiber Cement Cover” (FC), “Asphalt Road” (), “Terrain Road” (Te), “Cloud” (Cl) “Shadow” (Sh).
